_tutorial.info: This file contains all the products for your store.
how_to_add_a_new_product: 1. Copy an existing product block (from the opening '{' to the closing '}').
2. Paste it at the end of the list, just before the closing ']' bracket.
3. Change the values for the new product:
- 'slug': A unique, URL-friendly version of the name (e.g., 'classic-blue-jeans'). If a slug already exists, add a number to it (e.g., 'classic-blue-jeans-2'). THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT.
- 'price': The product price, as a whole number (no decimals).
- 'description': A short description for product lists.
- 'longDescription': A more detailed description for the product page.
- 'specifications': A list of key-value pairs for product specs. Add or remove as needed.
- 'category': The 'slug' of the category this product belongs to. This MUST exactly match a slug from categories.json.
- 'image': The URL for the main product image. Use a placeholder like 'https://placehold.co/600x600'.
- 'additionalImages': A list of URLs for more product images. Can be empty [].
- 'stock': The number of items in stock. Set to 0 for 'Out of Stock'.

products.name: Classic Cotton Tee
products.description: A timeless classic, this 100% cotton t-shirt is a must-have for any wardrobe. Soft, breathable, and durable.
products.longDescription: Our Classic Cotton Tee is the foundation of any modern wardrobe. Crafted from premium 100% long-staple cotton, it offers unparalleled softness and breathability. The fabric is pre-shrunk to ensure a consistent fit wash after wash. Featuring a classic crew neck, a tailored fit that's not too tight and not too loose, and double-stitched seams for added durability, this t-shirt is designed for both comfort and longevity. It's the perfect versatile piece to wear on its own or as a layering essential.

specifications.Care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Slim Fit Chinos
products.description: Our slim fit chinos offer a modern silhouette and all-day comfort. Made with a hint of stretch for the perfect fit.
products.longDescription: Elevate your smart-casual look with our Slim Fit Chinos. These trousers are engineered with a high-quality cotton twill fabric that includes a touch of elastane for comfortable stretch and freedom of movement. The slim-fit cut provides a sharp, contemporary silhouette that tapers from the knee to the ankle. Features include classic four-pocket styling, a zip fly with a button closure, and a durable construction that holds its shape throughout the day. Perfect for the office or a weekend outing.
